page.title: 02Communications - Paignton
page.content: On the eastern edge of the block are housing estates that fringe the town of {PAIGNTON,}whilst the bulk of the block is a typical Devon farming landscape. Dominating the whole of the block is the Beacon Hill Transmitter, transmitting ITV and BBC programmes to the whole of Torbay. This is situated on the highest point of the block, 196 metres above the sea. Two electricity grid lines trisect the block north to south, running parallel with the Torbay Ring Road (A3022). The Totnes to Paignton Road (A385) runs due east west along the southern edge of the block.
